main.aboutme: I am a seasoned Software Engineer with a dedicated approach to work and aspire to attain larger goals. My key interest lies in problem solving and building products which aims to solve real world problems with help of several programming languages and cloud solutions. Currently Iâ€™m working with Walmart Global Tech at Reston, Virginia as a Software Engineer.

projects.description: Over the last two years, I am proud about my contributions and achievements for these key projects. To summarize, I worked with the Red Hat's Ansible Team, Ansible an IaaS open source tool widely used by many organizations in the world. I had worked as a freelance consultant developing in-house application for automating a workflow used by approximately 50 employees. Several other contributions to open source and key learnings I've shared as per below and have linked my projects.

projects.name: IPTC Automation
projects.description: A full stack web application made to automate the process of adding metadata to images with a simple web User Interface

projects.name: Ansible Collection Memsource
